entry.title: Vulnerability Review:Ivanti CSA Exploits Authentication Bypass (CVE-2024-8963) and Command Injection (CVE-2024-8190)

link.title: Vulnerability Review:Ivanti CSA Exploits Authentication Bypass (CVE-2024-8963) and Command Injection (CVE-2024-8190)

entry.summary:
Overview
Ivanti CSA is a unified endpoint management platform that provides a comprehensive suite of tools for managing and securing devices, applications, and data across an organization’s network. It offers features such as asset management, software deployment, remote control, and security policies to ensure compliance and protect against cyber threats.

entry.title: ShowDoc Sql Injection and Remote Code Execution

link.title: ShowDoc Sql Injection and Remote Code Execution

entry.summary:
Overview
ShowDoc is a versatile online documentation tool tailored for IT teams, perfect for creating beautiful API documents, tech manuals, and more using markdown. Its features include automated document generation from code comments or via the RunApi client, multi-platform support, and robust team collaboration tools. entry.title: Zentao Authentication Bypass
entry.summary: Overview ZenTao is a widely used open-source project management software that offers functionalities like project management, product management, test management, document management, bug management, task management, and team collaboration. Before version 18.12 of ZenTao, there was an authentication bypass vulnerability, which could be exploited by attackers to bypass authentication and access ...

entry.title: IP-guard Authentication Bypass
entry.summary:
Overview
IP-guard is an enterprise information supervision system developed by a Chinese company. It is a simple, easy-to-use, and fully functional computer monitoring and control tool that prevents internal documents from being copied by restricting the use of mobile storage devices and applications. This facilitates enterprise control over the flow of information, effectively safeguards corp...

entry.title: CVE-2024-21650 XWiki RCE
entry.summary:
Overview
XWiki is a Java-based, highly customizable and extensible enterprise-level Wiki platform, offering cross-database support, a powerful plugin system, a flexible template engine, and comprehensive security management, suitable for knowledge management and collaboration across various business needs.
